author: lofwyr
msg: - clean up and fix the Grid: There were 2 positions of holding information about the columns/rows like "*;*" in the LayoutManager, and the number of columns e.g. 2, the number grows automatically in the grid, but this value wasn't updated for the LayoutManager, so in could happen an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.
